\chapter{Sample Appendix\label{apndxA}}

# Bookdown style captions

## Figure captions

Figure \@ref(fig:plot-bdown-cap) is an example of how we can use bookdown style figure captions. 

(ref:plot-bdown-cap) This is an awesome figure caption.

```{r, 'plot-bdown-cap', echo=FALSE, fig.cap="(ref:plot-bdown-cap)"}
ggplot(mtcars) + 
  aes(x = drat, y = mpg) + 
  geom_point()
```

## Table captions

Table \@ref(tab:table-summary) of the supplementary materials provides a numeric summary of the posterior distribution.


```{r, table-summary, eval=T, echo=F}
as_tibble(mtcars) %>% 
  slice(1:10) %>% 
  knitr::kable(format = "pandoc", align = rep("r", 11), 
        caption = "This is the table caption.",
        label = "table-summary")
```
